sections.paragraph: எப்படி, எத்தனை, எவ்வளவு, என்ன, எவ்விதம் - எதிர்மறை எச்சம்

ஆங்கில மூலம் / Original in English: Adverb from the base of G4226; an interrogitive particle of manner; in what way? (sometimes the question is indirect, how?); also as exclamation, how much!: - how, after (by) what manner (means), that. [Occasionally unexpressed in English.]
